reviewText: My son is obsessed with postman pat. Unfortunately when I purchased this I took the term "Universal" to mean for all DVD players. Alas no. This DVD WILL NOT WORK IN NORTH AMERICA! I had to rig up a back waters system to allow my son to watch them. The stories are so lovely, the whole family LOVES Pat!

Postman Pat is always a favorite with young and old and with my family. My grandchildren sure enjoy Postman Pat stories.
DVD is well done. It is an International format so you need the correct DVD player to view the DVD.
